title: Characteristics of an exponential function
text: Recall that an exponential function with the form $$f(x)=b^x$$, $$b>0$$, where b does not equal 1, has these characteristics: \\n \\n 1. one-to-one function \\n 2. horizontal asymptote: $$y=0$$ \\n 3. domain: $$(-\infty,\infty)$$ \\n 4. range: $$(0,\infty)$$ \\n 5. x-intercept: none \\n 6. y-intercept: (0,1) \\n 7. increasing if $$b>1$$ \\n 8. decreasing if $$b<1$$
